predecessor.translation[0].definitions[0: someone who had your job before you started doing it
Kennedy’s predecessor as president was the war hero Dwight Eisenhower.
predecessor.translation[0].definitions[1: a machine, system etc that existed before another one in a process of development
The new BMW has a more powerful engine than its predecessor.
predecessor.translation[1].definitions[0: a person who was in a particular post or job before the person who is doing it now
Problems he inherited from his predecessor led to the bank’s later troubles.
predecessor.translation[1].definitions[1: a machine, system, etc that existed before another one that has developed from it
The new car will have a more aerodynamic shape than its popular predecessor.
